news.title: Nvidia shares are down after a report that its OpenAI investment stalled. Here's what's happening
news.summary: N Nvidia's Jensen Huang criticized OpenAI's business strategy. The chip giant plans to invest up to $100 billion into the AI startup.

news.title: Oracle rises 5% after announcing $50 billion fundraising plans. Here's why
news.summary: The tech giant has invested huge sums in the AI infrastructure buildout in recent times. The company has also invested in a number of other areas such as machine learning and robotics.

news.title: Rare earth miners jump as Trump is reportedly eyeing mineral stockpile to reduce China dependence
news.summary: The move is aimed at cutting America's dependence on China for materials essential to electric vehicles, defense systems and advanced technology. Trump's move is also aimed at reducing America's reliance on China.

news.title: Disney beats Wall Street expectations propelled by theme parks and streaming
news.summary: The question of who will be named the successor to CEO Bob Iger is in the background of Disney's earnings report on Monday. Iger has been Disney's CEO for more than 20 years.

news.title: Housing affordability isn't just hurting buyers: More homeowners are falling behind on their mortgages
news.summary: of delinquencies among all mortgages remains small. But growth is occurring faster than late payments for other types of consumer loans. For more, go to CNN.com/mortgage.

news.title: There’s another big oil-and-gas merger, but shareholders aren’t happy
news.summary: Devon plans to acquire Coterra in an all-stock deal, as consolidation within the oil-and-gas sector continues. Devon plans to buy the oil and gas company in a deal worth more than $1 billion.

news.title: Oracle amps up its AI bet with a plan to raise as much as $50 billion this year
news.summary: Oracle intends to tap the debt and equity markets anew in 2026. After issuing an $18 billion bond offering last fall, Oracle intends to do so again.

news.title: Walt Disney reports solid gains in revenue but sees decline in net profit due to higher costs
news.summary: Walt Disney Co. missed expectations on net profit but came in slightly ahead on adjusted earnings per share and revenue. Walt Disney Company missed expectations for net profit, but was ahead onadjusted earnings per cent, revenue.

news.title: Europe just started building a ‘kill switch’ for U.S. tech — and the market isn’t priced for it, says this strategist
news.summary: Zoom and Microsoft are among those companies that could lose business as Europe seeks tech sovereignty, says Matthew Tuttle. Tuttle: Zoom and Microsoft may lose business in Europe as Europe wants tech sovereignty.

news.title: Nvidia’s OpenAI investment may not be as big as once hoped — and tech stocks are falling
news.summary: Jensen Huang said Nvidia still plans to invest in OpenAI but dialed back expectations around the size of the commitment. Huang: "We're not going to give up on AI yet"
